pages.text: $(li)A normal Jar can store 4 Buckets, 12 Bottles, or 6 Bowls of any fluid, including honey, milk, potions, soups, stews, dragon breath, and XP from bottle-o-enchanting.
$(li)You can save experience in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/experience_bottle)Bottle o' Enchanting$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)You can save Water in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bottle)Water Bottle$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)You can save Lava in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/lava_bottle)Lava Bottle$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)You can save Milk in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/neapolitan/milk_bottle)Milk Bottle$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)You can save Mushroom and Rabbit Stews in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a Stew in your hand.
$(li)You can save Dragon Breath in a Jar right clicking it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/dragon_breath)Dragon's Breath bottle$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)You can capture small aquatic creatures in a Jar like fish while you are holding a Jar in your hand.
$(li)You can save capture $(l:patchouli:creatures/supplementaries/firefly)Fireflies$(/l) in a Jar right clicking them while you are holding a Jar in your hand.
$(li)Jars can also be used to store $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cookies)Cookies$(/l) and Candies.
$(li)A Tinted Jar works like a common Jar.$(br)$(li)It can be used to capture specific small dangerous creatures.
$(li)You can capture $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/slime)Slimes$(/l) in Tinted Jars right clicking on one of them while you are holding it in your hand.
$(li)You can capture $(l:patchouli:illagers/vex)Vexes$(/l) in Tinted Jars right clicking on one of them while you are holding it in your hand.
$(li)You can capture $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/endermite)Endermites$(/l) in Tinted Jars right clicking on one of them while you are holding it in your hand.
